## Animated GIF creation
```{r echo=TRUE}
image_animate(image_scale(my_meme, "200x200"), fps = 1, dispose = "previous")

covid <- image_scale(image_read("https://labblog.uofmhealth.org/sites/lab/files/2020-12/group_of_experts_in_white_PPE.jpg"))

image_resize(c(covid), '200x200!') %>%
  image_background('white') %>%
  image_morph() %>%
  image_animate(optimize = TRUE)


```
